metadata.title: CVE-2022-1725 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.4959.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1').
